gui.common

Class TreeOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.common.TreeOperations

  • public final class TreeOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    TreeOperations provides useful utility functions for operating on JTrees.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private TreeOperations()
      Private Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getSelectedTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree)
      Returns the currently-selected node in the specified tree, or null if no node is selected.
      static void selectTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree, javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node)
      Selects a tree node and makes it visible.
      static void selectTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree, java.awt.Point point)
      Selects the tree node that occupies the specified (x,y) point.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedTreeNode

        public static javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getSelectedTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree)
        Returns the currently-selected node in the specified tree, or null if no node is selected.
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree for which the currently-selected node is desired

      • selectTreeNode

        public static void selectTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                  javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node)
        Selects a tree node and makes it visible.
        Parameters:
        tree - tree object in which the selection is to be made
        node - node to be selected

      • selectTreeNode

        public static void selectTreeNode(javax.swing.JTree tree,
                  java.awt.Point point)
        Selects the tree node that occupies the specified (x,y) point. This is used to select the tree node clicked on by the user.
        Parameters:
        tree - tree object in which the mouse click occurred
        point - coordinates of the mouse click event
